description:
As a seasoned leader in the advanced technology solutions industry, the Vice President of Business Development at SAIC is a key role in driving strategic direction and growth. We are looking for an individual who can bring their proven track record of success in developing and implementing comprehensive business development strategies that generate sustainable revenue growth. The ideal candidate should have a bachelor’s degree in a related field and at least 10 years of experience in a senior business development or sales role. They should have a deep understanding of the complex challenges and opportunities in the defense, intelligence, space, and civilian markets. The successful candidate must also have a proven track record of developing and executing comprehensive business development plans, with the ability to identify and capture new opportunities. The Vice President of Business Development at SAIC must be an enthusiastic leader who can inspire and motivate teams to achieve success. They must be a strategic thinker and have excellent communication, negotiation, and influencing skills. The VP should be able to think outside of the box and have a creative approach to problem solving. The ideal candidate must also have an entrepreneurial spirit with a passion for developing innovative solutions for customers.

Responsibilities:
Develop and implement comprehensive business development strategies to generate sustainable revenue growth
Identify and capture new opportunities
Lead teams to achieve success
Develop effective business development plans
Communicate and negotiate with customers
Utilize creative problem-solving skills
Possess an entrepreneurial spirit and passion for developing innovative solutions
Stay up to date on advanced technology solutions in the defense, intelligence, space, and civilian markets

SAIC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
